definition.name: Debugging with tmate
definition.description: Debug your GitHub Actions Environment interactively by using SSH or a Web shell
definition.author: Max Schmitt

inputs.name: sudo
inputs.description: If apt should be executed with sudo or without

inputs.name: install-dependencies
inputs.description: Whether or not to install dependencies for tmate on linux (openssh-client, xz-utils)

inputs.name: limit-access-to-actor
inputs.description: Whether to authorize only the public SSH keys of the user triggering the workflow (defaults to true if the GitHub profile of the user has a public SSH key)

inputs.name: detached
inputs.description: In detached mode, the workflow job will continue while the tmate session is active

inputs.name: connect-timeout-seconds
inputs.description: How long in seconds to wait for a connection to be established

inputs.name: tmate-server-host
inputs.description: The hostname for your tmate server (e.g. ssh.example.org)

inputs.name: tmate-server-port
inputs.description: The port for your tmate server (e.g. 2222)

inputs.name: tmate-server-rsa-fingerprint
inputs.description: The RSA fingerprint for your tmate server

inputs.name: tmate-server-ed25519-fingerprint
inputs.description: The ed25519 fingerprint for your tmate server

inputs.name: msys2-location
inputs.description: The root of the MSYS2 installation (on Windows runners)

inputs.name: github-token
inputs.description: Personal access token (PAT) used to call into GitHub's REST API. We recommend using a service account with the least permissions necessary. Also when generating a new PAT, select the least scopes necessary. [Learn more about creating and using encrypted secrets](https://help.github.com/en/actions/automating-your-workflow-with-github-actions/creating-and-using-encrypted-secrets)

outputs.name: ssh-command
outputs.description: The SSH command to connect to the tmate session (only set when detached mode is enabled)

outputs.name: ssh-address
outputs.description: The raw SSH address without the "ssh" prefix (only set when detached mode is enabled)

outputs.name: web-url
outputs.description: The web URL to connect to the tmate session (only set when detached mode is enabled and web URL is available)

evidence.reasoning: This action facilitates interactive debugging of GitHub Actions environments, which falls under debugging. It also involves communication via SSH and web shell, and it interacts with the infrastructure of the GitHub Actions environment.
